instructions.text:
If you found yourself stranded on a desert island and could only have three items magically provided to you, what would they be and why?

1. Open a MS Word document on your desk-top and answer the above question.

2. Save the MS Word document to your desktop.

3. Upload the saved document to the assignment (feel free to add additional written comments in the HTML editor or add an audio component)

4. When you have submitted the assignment please move to the next phase of your simulation in the content tool.

5. Please return to the tour by clicking Content in the blue navigation bar above.
